mapper.select: select gr.*, m.name, cm.name as challenger_name from game_record gr JOIN challenger c ON gr.game_code = #{game_code} AND c.state=1 AND gr.game_code = c.game_code JOIN member m ON gr.maker_code = m.member_code JOIN member cm ON c.challenger_member_code = cm.member_code AND gr.challenger_code = cm.member_code where gr.time_end is null
